name: chequebook
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a book of cheques with your name printed on them that is given to you by your bank to make payments with
LdF/E+/GettyImages chequebook journalism UK disapproving (US checkbook journalism)
the activity in which a newspaper persuades someone involved in a news story to give their report of events by paying them a lot of money

BANKING a book of cheques with your name and account details printed on them, which is given to you by your bank to make payments with
used to refer to someone spending money: An anonymous donor got out his chequebook and kept the organization from going under.
